cast.name: 安妮·罗斯·戴利 Áine Rose Daly

this_title: Does Your Condom Make You Fat?
trans_title: 你的避孕套会让你变胖吗？
introduction: Described as an “awkward” comedy-drama, the film explores a world in which men can become pregnant.Imrie plays Owen, a happy-go-lucky lad, whose reliance on the Zap App for effective contraception is disrupted when his phone battery dies. This realization triggers his fears of an unwanted pregnancy, amplified by his date’s early unannounced departure. Throughout the film, Owen grapples with a rollercoaster of emotions as he confronts the unintended consequences of his actions.
chinese_title: 你的避孕套会让你变胖吗？
foreign_title: Does Your Condom Make You Fat?
